Toast is my dog! 
He gets a special place on my blog because 1) he is very cute and 2) he deserves partial credit for being my devoted coding rubber duck for many years. 
He knows over 30 tricks and has competed in [barn hunt](https://www.barnhunt.com/index.html) and [agility](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog_agility).
